name: The Amazing Adventures of Scorpionman and Laundryboy
name_original: The Amazing Adventures of Scorpionman and Laundryboy
description:
Saving the world is fun and all... but who stays up all night to clean the mess afterwards?

In The Amazing Adventures of Scorpionman and Laundryboy, you play as Laundryboy, Scorpionman's tireless assistant who cleans the hero's suit, refills his poison darts and sharpens criminals most feared weapon, the stinger.

Can you keep up with Scorpionman and his legendary speed? You wouldn't want to send him out on a mission without boots or, even worse, with a stain on his suit, would you?

There's no time to waste. Crime doesn't sleep and the boil wash takes an awful lot of time!

How to Play:
  • Movement -> W, A, S, D or directional arrows
  • Interact -> E or Space Bar
What to do:

Deliver the required items before the time runs out. Take items out of the Storage Closets and bring them to the Delivery Station. But watch out! The closets are a mess, old items come back dirty or spent in the Laundry Basked and some items can only be refilled at a specific station.
